name: RealtyCandy MailChimp IDX Broker Connector
author: realtycandy

sections.description:
Real Estate is a business that requires great client followup. You have a MailChimp account and you have an IDXBroker account and you want to bring your IDX leads to MailChimp. This tool is a great way to do that right from WordPress.

You will be able to signup your IDX Broker clients automatically to get DRIP email campaigns, newsletters, and blog updates through MailChimp.

Use the settings page to select which MailChimp list you want your IDXBroker leads to go to, and you are off to the races. Our server will make the proper connections for you.

Premium Support is available at http://realtycandy.comby clicking on the “Support” link.

If you don’t have an account with IDX Broker, signup today at http://platinum.realtycandy.com

You can signup for a MailChimp account at http://mailchimp.com

You will also need a free RealtyCandy.com which you can get by signing up at http://realtycandy.com/signup-idx-addons/
The RealtyCandy server provides the “data bridge” between IDXBroker and MailChimp
sections.installation:
Installation:

  1. Upload RealtyCandy MailChimp IDX Broker Connector to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Be sure you have activated your free RealtyCandy account

  4. Setup a MailChimp account

  5. Setup a IDX Broker account
  6. Signup for a free RealtyCandy account at http://realtycandy.com/signup-idx-addons/
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

Does this work on Genesis and Equity? Yes.
